languages.text: "Сердце мое рвется в бой, брат Ульфар... Но ноги не спешат нести в сторону врага. Я присоединюсь к вам, когда смогу встать, если ты будешь любезен оставить для меня парочку еретиков".

"My heart is raring to fight, Brother Ulfar... But my legs are in no hurry to carry me toward the enemy. I will join the fray when I can stand, if you would be kind enough to leave a few heretics for my blade."
languages.original_text: "Сердце мое рвется в бой, брат Ульфар... Но ноги не спешат нести в сторону врага. Я присоединюсь к вам, когда смогу встать, если ты будешь любезен оставить для меня парочку еретиков".

traits.locale_text: "My heart is raring to fight, Brother Ulfar... But my legs are in no hurry to carry me toward the enemy. I will join the fray when I can stand, if you would be kind enough to leave a few heretics for my blade."
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

traits.locale_text: "My heart is raring to fight, Brother Ulfar... But my legs are in no hurry to carry me toward the enemy. I will join the fray when I can stand, if you would be kind enough to leave a few heretics for my blade."
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

traits.locale_text: "My heart is raring to fight, Brother Ulfar... But my legs are in no hurry to carry me toward the enemy. I will join the fray when I can stand, if you would be kind enough to leave a few heretics for my blade."
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

traits.locale_text: "My heart is raring to fight, Brother Ulfar... But my legs are in no hurry to carry me toward the enemy. I will join the fray when I can stand, if you would be kind enough to leave a few heretics for my blade."
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

languages.text: “我的心渴望战斗，乌尔法兄弟……但我的双腿并不急于冲向敌人。等我能站起来的时候，我会加入战斗的，希望到时候你能给我留几个异端分子。”
languages.original_text: "My heart is raring to fight, Brother Ulfar... But my legs are in no hurry to carry me toward the enemy. I will join the fray when I can stand, if you would be kind enough to leave a few heretics for my blade."

traits.locale_text: “我的心渴望战斗，乌尔法兄弟……但我的双腿并不急于冲向敌人。等我能站起来的时候，我会加入战斗的，希望到时候你能给我留几个异端分子。”
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

languages.text: 「気持ちは戦いたくてうずうずしてるんだ、ブラザー・ウルファー…だが、この両脚は俺を敵のところまで運ぶ気がない。立てるようになったら戦闘に加わろう、俺の刃に数人の異端者を残しといてくれる優しさがお前にあるなら」
languages.original_text: "My heart is raring to fight, Brother Ulfar... But my legs are in no hurry to carry me toward the enemy. I will join the fray when I can stand, if you would be kind enough to leave a few heretics for my blade."

traits.locale_text: 「気持ちは戦いたくてうずうずしてるんだ、ブラザー・ウルファー…だが、この両脚は俺を敵のところまで運ぶ気がない。立てるようになったら戦闘に加わろう、俺の刃に数人の異端者を残しといてくれる優しさがお前にあるなら」
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

languages.text: «Mi corazón arde en deseos de luchar, hermano Ulfar... Pero mis piernas no se aprestan por impulsarme ante el enemigo. Me uniré a la refriega cuando pueda tenerme en pie, si es que eres tan amable de dejarle un par de herejes a mi cuchilla».
languages.original_text: "My heart is raring to fight, Brother Ulfar... But my legs are in no hurry to carry me toward the enemy. I will join the fray when I can stand, if you would be kind enough to leave a few heretics for my blade."

traits.locale_text: «Mi corazón arde en deseos de luchar, hermano Ulfar... Pero mis piernas no se aprestan por impulsarme ante el enemigo. Me uniré a la refriega cuando pueda tenerme en pie, si es que eres tan amable de dejarle un par de herejes a mi cuchilla».
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

languages.text: « Mon cœur brûle de se battre, frère Ulfar... mais mes jambes ne sont pas pressées de me porter jusqu'à mon ennemi. Je te rejoindrai dès que je pourrai me lever, si tu veux bien épargner quelques hérétiques pour me permettre d'étancher ma lame. »
languages.original_text: "My heart is raring to fight, Brother Ulfar... But my legs are in no hurry to carry me toward the enemy. I will join the fray when I can stand, if you would be kind enough to leave a few heretics for my blade."

traits.locale_text: « Mon cœur brûle de se battre, frère Ulfar... mais mes jambes ne sont pas pressées de me porter jusqu'à mon ennemi. Je te rejoindrai dès que je pourrai me lever, si tu veux bien épargner quelques hérétiques pour me permettre d'étancher ma lame. »
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

languages.text: "Mein Herz will kämpfen, Bruder Ulfar ... aber meine Beine wollen mich nicht in Eile zum Feind tragen. Ich werde mich ins Getümmel stürzen, sobald ich wieder stehen kann, also lasst meiner Klinge bitte ein paar Ketzer übrig."
languages.original_text: "My heart is raring to fight, Brother Ulfar... But my legs are in no hurry to carry me toward the enemy. I will join the fray when I can stand, if you would be kind enough to leave a few heretics for my blade."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Herz will kämpfen, Bruder Ulfar ... aber meine Beine wollen mich nicht in Eile zum Feind tragen. Ich werde mich ins Getümmel stürzen, sobald ich wieder stehen kann, also lasst meine Klinge bitte ein paar Ketzer übrig."
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

languages.text: "Yüreğim savaşmak için sabırsızlanıyor Kardeş Ulfar. Fakat bacaklarım beni düşmana taşıyamayacak kadar yorgun. Ayakta durabildiğimde savaşa katılacağım. Tabii bana da birkaç kâfir bırakacak kadar cömert olursan..."
languages.original_text: "My heart is raring to fight, Brother Ulfar... But my legs are in no hurry to carry me toward the enemy. I will join the fray when I can stand, if you would be kind enough to leave a few heretics for my blade."

traits.locale_text: "Yüreğim savaşmak için sabırsızlanıyor Kardeş Ulfar. Fakat bacaklarım beni düşmana taşıyamayacak kadar yorgun. Ayakta durabildiğimde savaşa katılacağım. Tabii bana da birkaç kâfir bırakacak kadar cömert olursan..."
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine
